snippet: Roberto Kelly, San Francisco’s first-base coach, sustained a concussion when hit by a ball at batting practice on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Roberto Kelly, San Francisco’s first-base coach, sustained a concussion when hit by a ball at batting practice on Saturday.

headline.seo: N.L.C.S. — Giants’ Roberto Kelly to Miss First Two Games
headline.main: Giants Coach Struck by Ball Is Out for First 2 Games
headline.print_headline: Giants Coach Struck by Ball Is Out for First 2 Games
